value:
$nMPID_イドゥン|We are dressed as rabbits...for the
spring festival? I do not understand
the connection...

$nMPID_ファ|Look! I got some rabbit clothes, so
I'm a rabbit now! Watch! Hippity hop,
hippity hop!

$nMPID_イドゥン|You work even amid the festivities?
...Do you struggle to find meaning
in time spent with others as I do?

$nMPID_ファ|I love spring! It's so warm! And plus
there's flowers and butterflies! And
so many other pretty things too!

$nMPID_イドゥン|All these people gathered to pass the
time, smiling... Like something from
a dream...

$nMPID_イドゥン|I am Idunn. I bring warm spring
tidings from $Nf.

$nMPID_イドゥン|The warmth in the air... I can feel
spring's gentle sigh...

$nMPID_ファ|Everyone's supposed to have fun
at a festival, right? Well...let's have
some fun then! Wheee!

$nMPID_イドゥン|I am unworthy. You need not
say anything.

$nMPID_ファ|Ooh! Thanks! I'll have some fun
with this!

I am Idunn, and this child is Fae. She
desires to see the spring festival...and
I am bound to her by duty.

$nMPID_イドゥン|The more of the festival I see, the
less I understand. Why do people
behave in such ways?$k$p$nMPID_ファ|I don't know! But it's fun!$k$p$nMPID_イドゥン|But to what end? What is the
purpose of it?$k$p$nMPID_ファ|Well, look! Everyone is smiling!
Doesn't seeing everyone happy
make you feel...warm inside?$k$p$nMPID_イドゥン|I think...I understand. I will help
everyone to smile then. And perhaps
I will even be able to smile myself...$k$p$nMPID_ファ|Yeah! I know just where to start...
C'mon—let's go join the others!
This will be FUN!
ふっ
たあっ
きゃあっ…
いけない…！
$nMPID_二人|It's spring!
$nMPID_二人|And now... Kaboom!
$nMPID_イドゥン|The blessings of Mother Earth!
$nMPID_ファ|RAWR!
No!
Isn't it...too soon?
You can do it!
C'mon! Let's play outside!
"This...is fun." "Yeah!"
"This is spring!" "It's so warm..."
giggle
"What cute ears..." "Ehehehe!"
Hmm...Yes?
This way...
C'mon, c'mon!

$nMPID_ファ|Here you go! Have some flowers...
and be sure to try this candy!
It's scrumptious!
$nMPID_イドゥン|So sweet...
$nMPID_ファ|Are you happy? You're smiling!
$nMPID_イドゥン|Yes, I am. Thank you...

$nMPID_ファ|No problem! Hmm... Uh, what else will
make you smile? Oh, I know!
$nMPID_イドゥン|Fae? Where are you going?

$nMPID_ファ|Hey, bunny! Wait for me! Agh! Oh, that
stings! Waah!
$nMPID_イドゥン|You'll be all right. Don't cry...
$nMPID_ファ|*sob* ...Idunn?

$nMPID_イドゥン|Here... You can have this candy...
and these flowers.
$nMPID_ファ|You're giving them to me? Thank you!
$nMPID_イドゥン|You...are smiling.

$nMPID_ファ|Whoa, YOU put a smile on MY face!
With me, it's usually the other
way around!
$nMPID_イドゥン|Ehehe... I suppose so.

$nMPID_ファ|I'm smiling, you're smiling, everybody's
smiling! That makes me happy!

$nMPID_イドゥン|Strange, isn't it? If you smile,
I also smile. I wonder why...

$nMPID_ファ|Idunn, let's keep smiling
together forever! Heheh.
